text.style: font-size: 18px; animation: 9s ease 0s infinite normal none running roleCycle;
font-size: 18px; animation: 9s ease 3s infinite normal none running roleCycle;
font-size: 18px; animation: 9s ease 6s infinite normal none running roleCycle;

div.style: display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 8px; justify-content: flex-end;

span.style: background: rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.1); color: rgb(121, 192, 255); border: 1px solid rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.4); border-radius: 100px; padding: 4px 12px; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; font-family: ui-monospace, monospace; opacity: 0; animation: 0.5s ease-out 0.5s 1 normal forwards running fadeIn;

background: rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.1); color: rgb(121, 192, 255); border: 1px solid rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.4); border-radius: 100px; padding: 4px 12px; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; font-family: ui-monospace, monospace; opacity: 0; animation: 0.5s ease-out 0.6s 1 normal forwards running fadeIn;

background: rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.1); color: rgb(121, 192, 255); border: 1px solid rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.4); border-radius: 100px; padding: 4px 12px; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; font-family: ui-monospace, monospace; opacity: 0; animation: 0.5s ease-out 0.7s 1 normal forwards running fadeIn;

background: rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.1); color: rgb(121, 192, 255); border: 1px solid rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.4); border-radius: 100px; padding: 4px 12px; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; font-family: ui-monospace, monospace; opacity: 0; animation: 0.5s ease-out 0.8s 1 normal forwards running fadeIn;

background: rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.1); color: rgb(121, 192, 255); border: 1px solid rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.4); border-radius: 100px; padding: 4px 12px; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; font-family: ui-monospace, monospace; opacity: 0; animation: 0.5s ease-out 0.9s 1 normal forwards running fadeIn;

background: rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.1); color: rgb(121, 192, 255); border: 1px solid rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.4); border-radius: 100px; padding: 4px 12px; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; font-family: ui-monospace, monospace; opacity: 0; animation: 0.5s ease-out 1s 1 normal forwards running fadeIn;

background: rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.1); color: rgb(121, 192, 255); border: 1px solid rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.4); border-radius: 100px; padding: 4px 12px; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; font-family: ui-monospace, monospace; opacity: 0; animation: 0.5s ease-out 1.1s 1 normal forwards running fadeIn;

background: rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.1); color: rgb(121, 192, 255); border: 1px solid rgba(56, 139, 253, 0.4); border-radius: 100px; padding: 4px 12px; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; font-family: ui-monospace, monospace; opacity: 0; animation: 0.5s ease-out 1.2s 1 normal forwards running fadeIn;

text.style: fill: rgb(240, 246, 252); font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 1px; text-transform: uppercase; opacity: 0.7;

div.style: color: rgb(201, 209, 217); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.6; opacity: 0; animation: 1s ease-out 0.3s 1 normal forwards running fadeIn;

foreignObject.div: Full Stack Developer. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—é –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã–µ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ Java/Kotlin, React –∏ –æ–±–ª–∞–∫–∞—Ö. –°—Ñ–µ—Ä—ã –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–æ–≤: –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã, DevOps, Android. –õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è: üåç EU/Remote. –û–ø—ã—Ç: 5+ –ª–µ—Ç. –û—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç –∫ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è–º.

text.style: fill: rgb(240, 246, 252); font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 1px; text-transform: uppercase; opacity: 0.7;

div.style: color: rgb(139, 148, 158); font-size: 13px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif; overflow: hidden; display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 3; -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
